name: catalog.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-catalog
  datasource:
    driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-anton/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-catalog"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
#    show-sql: true
    properties:
      hibernate:
#        format_sql: true
        connection:
          release_mode: after_transaction
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jackson:
    serialization:
      fail_on_empty_beans: false
    deserialization:
      read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
  jmx:
    enabled: false
  profiles:
    active: ${SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE:local}
    include: notification
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-6784:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
server:
  port: 8080
  servlet:
    context-path: /nttm-catalog
data:
  comment: 11
  net-comment: 21
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
nttm:
  argusPrefix: "http://127.0.0.1:8087"
  prefix: "http://127.0.0.1:8082"
  auth:
    username: "argus_intgr"
    password: "c4d123f2cb08ff23434f34v3434v3cf"
cron:
  service-type: "0 0 2 ? * SUN" # Каждое воскресенье в 2 часа ночи
  service-connection: "0 0 2 ? * SUN" # Каждое воскресенье в 2 часа ночи
  service-equipment: "0 0 2 ? * *" # Каждый день в 2 часа ночи
  service-type-repeat: "0 0 4 ? * SUN" # Каждое воскресенье в 4 часа ночи
  service-connection-repeat: "0 0 4 ? * SUN" # Каждое воскресенье в 4 часа ночи
  service-equipment-repeat: "0 0 4 ? * *" # Каждый день в 4 часа ночи
argus-sltu:
  mrfs:
    mrf[0]: "PR" # Макро регион Волга
#    mrf[1]: "UR" # Макро регион Урал
#    mrf[2]: "SZ" # Макро регион Северо-Запад
#    mrf[3]: "UF" # Макро регион Юг
